item.title: Etc
item.description:
2009 Finger Touch Tracking,

R&D: Worked on a project for finger tracking with Bezier Forward Difference

2008 Adjustable Game Probabilities with Constraints

R&D: Worked on adjustable game probability in Impression Co.

2006 Camera Work and Shader Coputation

R&D: Worked on Camera Work related to curve tracking and Shader Computation

2003 Scene Graph Library, Maya Plugin

R&D: Worked on building scene graph library and related Maya Plugins in Cenozoic Co.

2001 Skeleton Retargeting and Motion Capture Reprocessing

R&D: Worked on motion captured data reprocessing in Cenozoic Co.

1998 Text MUD

Worked on Text MUD game for personal enjoyment
